text: ⸤The leaders⸥\f + \fr 36:1 \ft Literally “The heads” \f* of the families\f + \fr 36:1 \ft Or “fathers” \f* of the clans of descendants\f + \fr 36:1 \ft Or “sons” \f* of Gilead the son of Makir, the son of Manasseh, of the clans of the descendants\f + \fr 36:1 \ft Or “sons” \f* of Joseph came near and spoke ⸤before⸥\f + \fr 36:1 \ft Literally “before the face of” \f* Moses and ⸤before⸥\f + \fr 36:1 \ft Literally “before the face of” \f* ⸤the leaders⸥\f + \fr 36:1 \ft Literally “the heads” \f* of the families\f + \fr 36:1 \ft Hebrew “of the fathers” \f* of the ⸤Israelites⸥.\f + \fr 36:1 \ft Literally “sons/children of Israel” \f*

And they said, “Yahweh commanded my lord to give the land by lot as an inheritance to the ⸤Israelites⸥,\f + \fr 36:2 \ft Literally “sons/children of Israel” \f* and my lord was commanded by Yahweh to give the inheritance of Zelophehad our brother to his daughters.

But if they become wives to one of the sons from \add another\add* tribe of the ⸤Israelites⸥,\f + \fr 36:3 \ft Literally “sons/children of Israel” \f* their inheritance will disappear from the inheritance of our ancestors,\f + \fr 36:3 \ft Or “fathers” \f* and it will be added to the inheritance of the tribe to which they belong; the lot of our inheritance would disappear.

When the Jubilee of the ⸤Israelites⸥\f + \fr 36:4 \ft Literally “sons/children of Israel” \f* ⸤comes⸥,\f + \fr 36:4 \ft Literally “will be” \f* it will be added to the inheritance of the tribe to which they belong; and their inheritance will disappear from the tribe of our father.”

Then Moses commanded the ⸤Israelites⸥\f + \fr 36:5 \ft Literally “sons/children of Israel” \f* by the command of Yahweh, saying, “The tribe of the descendants\f + \fr 36:5 \ft Or “sons” \f* of Joseph \add is\add* right \add regarding what they are\add* speaking.

This \add is\add* the word that Yahweh commanded the daughters of Zelophehad, saying, ‘⸤Let them marry⸥\f + \fr 36:6 \ft Literally “Let them be as wives” \f* ⸤whomever they like⸥;\f + \fr 36:6 \ft Literally “they will be as the good in their eyes” \f* only ⸤they must marry⸥\f + \fr 36:6 \ft Literally “they must be as wives” \f* from within the clan of the tribe of their father.

Thus an inheritance of the ⸤Israelites⸥\f + \fr 36:7 \ft Literally “sons/children of Israel” \f* will not go around from tribe to tribe. Rather, the inheritance of each tribe of his father will remain with the ⸤Israelites⸥.\f + \fr 36:7 \ft Literally “sons/children of Israel” \f*

Every daughter who possesses an inheritance from the tribes of the ⸤Israelites⸥\f + \fr 36:8 \ft Literally “sons/children of Israel” \f* will ⸤marry⸥\f + \fr 36:8 \ft Literally “be a wife to” \f* one of the clan of the tribe of her father, so that the ⸤Israelites⸥\f + \fr 36:8 \ft Literally “sons/children of Israel” \f* will possess the inheritance of his ancestors.\f + \fr 36:8 \ft Or “fathers” \f*

Therefore an inheritance will not go around from \add one\add* tribe to another tribe because the tribes of the ⸤Israelites⸥\f + \fr 36:9 \ft Literally “sons/children of Israel” \f* will each hold to their \add own\add* inheritance.’ ”
Just as Yahweh commanded to Moses, so the daughters of Zelophehad did:
Mahlah, Tirzah, Hoglah, Milcah, and Noah, the daughters of Zelophehad, ⸤married⸥\f + \fr 36:11 \ft Literally “were as wives to” \f* the sons of their uncles.

⸤They married⸥\f + \fr 36:12 \ft Literally “They were as wives to” \f* those from the sons of Manasseh son of Joseph, and their inheritance ⸤remained⸥\f + \fr 36:12 \ft Literally “was” \f* among the tribe of the clan of their ancestors.\f + \fr 36:12 \ft Or “fathers” \f*

These \add were\add* the commands and the stipulations that Yahweh commanded by the hand of Moses\f + \fr 36:13 \ft Or “through Moses” \f* to the ⸤Israelites⸥\f + \fr 36:13 \ft Literally “sons/children of Israel” \f* on the desert-plateaus of Moab by the Jordan \add across\add* Jericho.
